segments.text: Excuse me . I am interested in getting a library card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , let me give you an application . You can fill it out right here at the counter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me take a look at this for you . May I have your driver's license , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You seem to have filled the form out all right . Are you familiar with our rules and fines ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The hours and limitations are printed on the card and this handout .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for joining the library ; we look forward to serving you .
segments.speaker: S2
